description:
In the heart of Spanish Harlem! You’ll love how spacious & light-filled it is, a sanctuary above a vibrant neighborhood. Great for couples, business travelers, creative souls, families (children 10+), & big groups.
Stay here if you like lots of raw steel, exposed brick, colorful art and vintage vinyl!
Premium amenities:
-Pottery Barn Hydrocotton towels
-Memory foam queen-sized beds
-Triple sheeting, 400tc
-Additional twin daybed in living room
-Fully stocked kitchen
-Ample closet room

All areas of the apartment are available for guest access, except for items clearly in storage in the bedroom closets.

I will be available to answer any questions through text message anytime! I am only occasionally available to check you in/out, so we will most likely not be meeting personally.
name: Light-filled Industrial 2BR Loft
review: Sehr gute Lage der Wohnung. Nicht weit zur Subway. Supermarkt um die Ecke. Viele Schnellimbisse. Gute Restaurants. Die Gastgeberin war immer erreichbar und hat schnell geantwortet bzw. Anliegen zeitnah erledigt.
